entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
